body.name: USB Microphone, MAONO 192KHZ/24Bit Plug & Play PC Computer Podcast Condenser Cardioid Metal Mic Kit with Professional Sound Chipset for Recording, Gaming, Singing, YouTube (AU-A04)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 17. Order within 7 hrs 55 mins
features: 【Professional Sound Chipset 192kHz/24Bit】: This Condenser Microphone has been designed with professional sound chipset, which let the USB microphone hold high resolution sampling rate. SAMPLING RATE: 192kHz/24bit!!! Smooth, flat frequency response of 30Hz-16kHz--Extended frequency response is excellent for singing, speech and Voice over, Performed perfectly in reproduces sound, high quality mic ensure your exquisite sound reproduces on the internet.

【Plug And Play 】: The microphone has USB 2.0 data port which is easy to connect with your computer and Linux operation system, and no need extra driver software, and no need for an external sound card. Double shielding USB cable reduces interference. That makes it easy to sound good on a podcast, livestream, video call, or most any other kind of recording.

【16mm Electret Condenser Transducer & Magnet Ring】: With the 16mm electret condenser transducer, the USB microphone can give you a strong bass response. This professional condenser microphone picks up crystal clear audio. The magnet ring, on the USB microphone cable, have a strong anti-interference function, which makes you have a better feel.

【Sturdy Boom Arm Set】: With a pop filter and a foam windscreen, the condenser mic records your voice and the sound is crystal clear, the shock mount holds the microphone steady with damping function. Particularly good for video voiceovers; podcasts; YouTube video; skype conferences and so on.

【Compatible With MOST OS】: For all Laptop, PC and Mobile phones. But if you want connect with phone, you need an OTG adapter (not included). Strong output, no distortion, low power consumption. PACKING LIST: Condenser Mic + Adjustable Scissor Arm Stand + Metal Shock Mount + Pop Filter + Foam Mic Windscreen + Table Mounting Clamp + USB-B to USB-A Cable.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MAONO, stands for Vision, a young & vigorous brand globally. As podcasts, live streams, short videos play an important position in social media like YouTube, Facebook channels, more creators realize the importance of better recording quality for video. MAONO AU-A04 USB Microphone Kit: AU-A04 podcast microphone is a classic microphone launched by MAONO. It is plug and play, easy to install and set up, and very suitable for starters. Loved by numerous users since its release.

Adjustable Angle and Foldable Arm Band The suspension boom scissor arm stand in fully adjustable in all parts. The arms of the stand are extensible in 135° back and forth, and 180° up and down, and it can be folded up. It enabling you to adjust the suitable angle and height to show your perfect voice. Premium shock mount Made of high-quality metal and high elasticity rope. It can protect the microphone all-around with high elasticity wrap roping design, which makes the microphone more convenient to install and prevents the microphone from falling. The shock mount has a foam protection wall, which is used to hold and protect the microphone. USB-A to USB-B cable： The USB 2.0 interface can be connected directly to the computer without any drivers to work The Magnet Ring avoids electromagnetic interference, provide a clearer and smoother recording

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use plug and play Great sound quality
reviews.reviewText: So i was looking for a starter microphone for YouTube videos for my channel. looked through reviews on google, all the top 10 mics were 200 bucks to 500 dollars. I needed something affordable to get started with, so started looking at amazon reviews for 20-100 dollar mics on a swing arm. This one caught my eye with a lot of reviews for a decent price. it is totally worth the money. It was literally plug and play, just went in to my windows sound menu and selected it as my default mice. it DOES NOT have a mute, but doesn't record unless you start your recording program and will start recording immediately. I used . My Geforce Experience recording and it works fine. be warned it has great pick up use the pop filter, and it picks up my stupid chair squeaking. while they clamps to hold it in place are not what i would say are top notch quality they do the job, swing arm is good, and cable is USB and is of good length i run 3 monitors 27In on right 36IN TV center and 24IN on left with computer on the far right and mic on the far left and cable works fine. Great Value and quality for $54 dollars shipped. so if your just getting started streaming or other social media this is a great starter Microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars WOW!! A great microphone for a bargain price
reviews.reviewText: An amazing microphone (and holder/boom arm) that sounds great!You COULD pay $200, $300, $400 for the microphone that Joe Rogan uses (Or your favorite Youtuber, podcaster, etc..)But we are living in a time where you can get incredible audio quality for 1/4 of that price.That comes from this microphone.You can get GREAT sound quality without FINANCIAL STRESS.Why add more stress when you can get great sound quality?Okay, if you are an audio engineer, or need the best of the best of the best, then I can see how you might want something else.But, for me, I just wanted something that sounded crisp, professional, is easy to use, and comes with a boom arm/pop filter.And this exceeded my expectations for all those! I am very pleased.If you want GREAT quality audio with the LEAST amount of financial stress -- this is your answer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great mic and package for a low price
reviews.reviewText: I've been doing my research on microphones for use with a new Podcast series that my friend and I want to start as well as some YouTube product review videos. First off, compared with the two previous mics that I had, this thing is amazing for the price and when you consider everything you get with the package it's the best place to start.The stand is sufficient and holds everything very steady and is fully adjustable with some good tensioning knobs to keep it in place. The pop filter fits nicely although I like to just use the wind foam that slides over the mic itself. It's sounds the same and allows me to keep a clearer view of my desk and my monitor. The best part is the sound quality. Is it the best mic out there--no--but with a bit of tuning in your DAW (Digital Audio Workstation) you'll be amazed at how good of a recording you can get from this it. I like everything about it so far. One thing to keep in mind is that if you back away too far from the Mic, even with the gain up, your voice is going to sound more ambient. Keeping your face 2-4 inches from the mic produces clear and well detailed audio. The USB option just works perfectly on my Mac, and on my PC--although I use this with GarageBand on my Mac. If you're just starting out and you want all the bells and whistles for recording your voice for well under $100 you can't go wrong with this setup. Enjoy!UPDATE 4/16/2019 - I'll need to strike my comment about the mic being more abient as I pull back, that is a function of the space I'm sitting in. I'm going to add some curtains and sound insulating panels to some the open areas of my new home studio to reduce the echos that the room produces. This is one sensitive mic! Also, something that just blew my mind. I realized that my desk was too deep for the extension arm that came with the mic so I surfed around and realized that Maono also had a mic setup like this with a desktop mic stand (using a weighted base). I reached out to them and asked if I could purchase that stand separately, letting them know how much I loved their mic setup. At first they said that they don't offer the stand separately, but then decided to just mail me the stand free of change. That's right, "FREE OF CHARGE!" I was so blown away by this. Talk about customer service. Don't let the lower price fool you folks, these are good folks and their product is worth serious consideration before you drop a lot more money on something that might be as good or even less. I can't imaging needing something better for podcasting and youtube video production.

reviews.reviewTitle: Minha voz fica igual de locutor
reviews.reviewText: Surreal a qualidade deste equipamento.Sem sombra de dúvidas foi uma das melhores aquisições que fiz agora em 2023.Vai me permitir gravar vídeos com qualidade de áudio profissional.
I use this for my home office for Teams, Zoom, etc and it is great, very flexible to move.
